Package Model.modifiableDates

Class ModifiableDate

java.lang.Object
Model.modifiableDates.ModifiableDate
public class ModifiableDate
extends java.lang.Object
Auxiliary class that allow us to test with modifiable and controlled dates
Author:
PADSOF Teachers

    • setDate

      public static java.time.LocalDate setDate​(int day, int month, int year)
      To set the modifiable date to a specific values given the day, month and year as parameters.
      Parameters:
      day - The day for the new modifiable date
      month - The month for the modifiable date
      year - The year for the modifiable date
      Returns:
      The current modifiable date with the values specified as parameters
